short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to manage users' bookmarks with a beautiful user interface. Users can Add, Delete and, use bookmarks from a single place

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to manage users' bookmarks with a beautiful user interface. Users can Add, Delete and, use bookmarks from a single place. Extension does not store or process any data remotely. When a user adds a bookmark via extension, it also gets added to browser bookmarks.
